mapper.select: SELECT atch_file_id AS atchFileId , file_sn AS fileSn , file_stre_cours AS fileStreCours , stre_file_nm AS streFileNm , orignl_file_nm AS orignlFileNm , file_extsn AS fileExtsn , file_cn AS fileCn , file_size AS fileSize FROM file_detail_tb FD WHERE FD.atch_file_id = #{atchFileId} ORDER BY FD.file_sn ASC

SELECT atch_file_id AS atchFileId , file_sn AS fileSn , file_stre_cours AS fileStreCours , stre_file_nm AS streFileNm , orignl_file_nm AS orignlFileNm , file_extsn AS fileExtsn , file_cn AS fileCn , file_size AS fileSize FROM file_detail_tb FD WHERE FD.file_sn in (select max(file_sn) from file_detail_tb fdt where atch_file_id =#{atchFileId} group by atch_file_id )

SELECT atch_file_id AS atchFileId , file_sn AS fileSn , file_stre_cours AS fileStreCours , stre_file_nm AS streFileNm , orignl_file_nm AS orignlFileNm , file_extsn AS fileExtsn , file_cn AS fileCn , file_size AS fileSize FROM file_detail_tb FD WHERE FD.atch_file_id = #{atchFileId} AND FD.file_sn = #{fileSn}

SELECT f.atch_file_id AS atchFileId , f.creat_dt AS creatDt , f.use_at AS useAt , b.regist_id as registId FROM file_tb AS f INNER JOIN bbs_tb AS b ON f.atch_file_id = b.atch_file_id WHERE f.atch_file_id = #{atchFileId}
select lpad(nvl(max(atch_file_id), 0)+1, 20, 0) from bbs_tb where atch_file_id is not null and atch_file_id <> ''
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM file_detail_tb WHERE atch_file_id = #{atchFileId} AND file_sn = #{fileSn}
mapper.select: SELECT IF( t.posbl_atch_file_number >= (t.fileCount + #{fileCount}), 1, 0 ) AS isFileUpload FROM ( SELECT (SELECT (select posbl_atch_file_number from bbs_master_tb where bbs_id = b.bbs_id) FROM bbs_tb as b WHERE b.atch_file_id = #{atchFileId}) as posbl_atch_file_number , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_detail_tb WHERE atch_file_id = #{atchFileId}) as fileCount FROM DUAL ) AS t

SELECT atch_file_id AS atchFileId , file_sn AS fileSn , file_stre_cours AS fileStreCours , stre_file_nm AS streFileNm , orignl_file_nm AS orignlFileNm , file_extsn AS fileExtsn , file_cn AS fileCn , file_size AS fileSize FROM file_detail_tb FD WHERE FD.atch_file_id = #{atchFileId} ORDER BY file_sn DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT f.atch_file_id AS atchFileId , f.creat_dt AS creatDt , f.use_at AS useAt , fm.regist_id as registId FROM file_tb AS f INNER JOIN floor_management_tb AS fm ON f.atch_file_id = fm.atch_file_id WHERE f.atch_file_id = #{atchFileId}
